label: Pool with slot reuse
approach: Spawn N worker coroutines (where N = concurrency). Each worker pulls the next task from a shared index, runs it, and loops until no tasks remain. Results are stored by original index to preserve order.
steps: Create a results array and a shared next-index counter.
Define a worker function that loops: grab the next index, run that task, store the result.
Spawn min(concurrency, tasks.length) workers — each runs independently.
await Promise.all(workers) — all tasks complete when every worker is done.
Return the results array (already in the correct order by index).
